instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Photos app . Sign in to your Google Account. At the top, tap Menu . Select Settings and then Back up & sync . Tap "Back up & sync" on or off. If you've run out of storage, scroll down and tap Turn off backup .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Photos app . Sign in to your Google Account. At the top right, tap your Google Account profile picture or the place holder letter if your profile picture hasn't been added. You can view if backup is complete or if you have items in wait to back up. Learn how to fix backup issues.
